ygData.msgSnippet: I get it as Elizabeth Adams ... From: Elizabeth Adams [mailto:ea9999@hotmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, November 15, 2000 12:38 PM To: EQ_women@egroups.com Subject:
ygData.messageBody:
I get it as Elizabeth Adams

-----Original Message-----
From: Elizabeth Adams [mailto:ea9999@...]
Sent: Wednesday, November 15, 2000 12:38 PM
To: EQ_women@egroups.com
Subject: [EQ_women] Re: hello all =)


Hi, Sanna, nice to see you here.

I assume your husband has a separate account and PC, or there could
be some ugly scenes in store as the addiction grips....

How does playing with your RL partner work? My boyfriend thinks I am
a half-crazed addict, and plans to stick to the odd blast of Quake
and Unreal, but I rather imagine it to be nice to hunt together. That
said, there are earlier threads on the board saying the opposite, as
well as supporting the idea.

BTW, can anyone tell me why my very first post appeared under my
name, while subsequent ones appear under my e-mail address?

Liz, aka Gyngermynx, ranger of the 23rd season, Quellious
